name: Mad Scientist (Apothical Studios)
description:
Some features present in the game may either be updated or removed in later updates.  

The game was originally meant to be developed in a few days, but ended up taking a little while longer as I wanted to add more UI and text for people first starting the game. 

Although it currently has all the features I originally intended it to have, I may update the game with more features such as more difficult environment puzzles (e.g. disappearing floor tiles) and more story. 

What is the Game About: 

Play as a scientist tasked with creating potions that give people powers such as increased speed and intelligence. When something goes wrong in the laboratory causing it to develop a mind of its own, you have to find a way to put it right as soon as possible… somehow the potions you made that give humans powers seems to stop the laboratory from acting up temporarily… even if it is a rather messy solution. 
Is there a more permanent solution out there? 

Throw, drink and mix potions of different colours to solve the colour based puzzles. 

Controls: 

WASD movement.
Pick up potions with E. 
Throw potions with Left Mouse. 
Drink potions with F.
Mix potions with V. 

Drinking potions gives you different temporary buffs:

Red: Increase movement speed.
Blue: Decrease potion reaction speed (potions smash faster when thrown) 
Yellow: -1 second to timer. 

Mixing potions gives you an increased chance of hitting multiple tiles. Also, mixed potions keep one effect (random) from the 2 potions mixed together.
